headings: Main configuration,esthesis CORE configuration (core data sync)
content:
NAME DESCRIPTION
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_PUSH_ENABLED Whether syncronising data to the esthesis CORE is enabled or not.Default: false
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_PUSH_URL The URL of the MQTT server used by esthesis CORE to use.Default: ssl://mosquitto.esthesis:8883
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_PUSH_TOPIC_TELEMETRY The topic to use when pushing telemetry data to esthesis CORE.Default: esthesis/telemetry
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_PUSH_TOPIC_PING The topic to use when pushing ping data to esthesis CORE.Default: esthesis/ping
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_REGISTRATION_ENABLED Whether new esthesis EDGE devices are registered as devices in esthesis CORE or not.Default: false
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_REGISTRATION_SECRET The secret token to use when registering new devices in esthesis CORE.
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_TAGS The tags used to identify the device in esthesis CORE.Default: edge
ESTHESIS_EDGE_CORE_KEY_ALGORITHM The algorithm used to generate the device keys by esthesis CORE.Default: RSA
